title: Liam Hemsworth's stunning new girlfriend named as Australian actress Maddison Brown
text:

Liam Hemsworth is putting his split with Miley Cyrus behind him after getting a stunning new girlfriend.

She's now been named as Australian actress Maddison Brown, who is best known for her role as Kirby Anders in Dynasty.

The actor, 29, was spotted enjoying a low key date with the 22-year-old blonde in New York City yesterday.

They looked very loved up and held hands while they wandered around the West Village area of the city before heading for dinner and drinks at Italian restaurant Sant Ambroeus.

Neither Hunger Games star Liam or Maddison has confirmed their romance on social media.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: maddisonbrown/Instagram)

Maddison has also starred in Strangerland with Nicole Kidman and Australian TV series The Kettering Incident in 2016.

Miley and Liam announced their split in August after less than a year of marriage.

While he appears to be moving on, Miley is already on her second fling since they called it quits.

(Image: PA)

Just days after the announcement she was spotted kissing Kaitlynn Carter on a yacht while on holiday in Italy.

They dated for a few weeks before Miley ended things, reportedly not wanting anything serious.

Since that coupling fell apart, Miley has been seen kissing Cody Simpson, in what has been a rollercoaster few months for the former Disney Channel star.

(Image: maddisonbrown/Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The pair have been dating for a few weeks with Miley even referring to him as her 'boyfriend.'

Miley seems smitten with the new man in her life as she admitted she felt the 'luckiest' to have him by her side as she recovered from a throat infection.

The singer spoke out about their 'make out sessions' last week and said Cody was just 'her type.'
